body: Twenty-one-year-old boxer Raju Budhamagar died last Wednesday after being knocked down by a punch during a boxing game. The Radiant Star  discusses about the lessons learnt from the boxers death.
original_body: Twenty-one-year-old boxer Raju Budhamagar died last Wednesday after being knocked down by a punch during a boxing game. The Radiant Star discusses about the lessons learnt from the boxers death.
title: Nepal: Tackling Sport Injuries And Death

sentence: Twenty-one-year-old boxer Raju Budhamagar died last Wednesday after being knocked down by a punch during a boxing game.
The Radiant Star  discusses about the lessons learnt from the boxers death.
